name: Starz
description: Starz is a multipurpose token, powering various activity-to-earn platforms through its powerful economy. The end goal is providing the industry with an inclusive and all-ruling token where one single token powers a wide range of Web3 platforms. The activity-to-earn platforms lack a unified system in which the usersâ€™ lifestyle would be fully integrated into the Web3 world through an all-in-one ecosystem. STARZ Economy offers an all-in-one solution: it powers multiple activity-to-earn platforms , providing a seamless monetary system and solving the integration problem. So far, the Starz token has been the force behind two fully functioning play-to-earn and trade-to-earn platforms, and many more activity-based platforms are lined up to be joining this strong economy and provide users with a seamless experience.
